testcase.classname: Verify the name and product details in automation test store application
testcase.name: Validate the product details after checkout on payments page
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the browser and navigate to automation test store application..passed And Click on login or register button.......................................passed And user enters username and userpassword on login account screen...........passed And Click on login button...................................................passed When User add product to the cart and click on checkout.....................passed Then Validate product "Shaving cream" details on payments page..............passed And User logout the test store application..................................passed
